docs.snippet: LEAD: For the very first time in an acting career that began when she was a teen-ager, there is talk of an Academy Award for Jessica Tandy. ''It's lovely,'' the 80-year-old star of ''Driving Miss Daisy'' said the other day, her attentive, ascetic ...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: For the very first time in an acting career that began when she was a teen-ager, there is talk of an Academy Award for Jessica Tandy. ''It's lovely,'' the 80-year-old star of ''Driving Miss Daisy'' said the other day, her attentive, ascetic face suddenly lighting up in a girlish smile. ''This is by far the best movie role I ever had.

headline.main: At 80, Jessica Tandy May Add an Oscar To Her Three Tonys

docs.snippet: LEAD: Jimmy Van Heusen, who composed the music for ''Moonlight Becomes You,'' ''Sunday, Monday or Always,'' ''Call Me Irresponsible'' and ''All the Way,'' among many other popular ballads, died yesterday at his home in Rancho Mirage, Calif., after...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Jimmy Van Heusen, who composed the music for ''Moonlight Becomes You,'' ''Sunday, Monday or Always,'' ''Call Me Irresponsible'' and ''All the Way,'' among many other popular ballads, died yesterday at his home in Rancho Mirage, Calif., after a long illness. He was 77 years old.

headline.main: Jimmy Van Heusen Is Dead at 77; Prolific Composer of Pop Songs

docs.snippet: LEAD: Mephistopheles cavorted on stage Thursday night in a new Hal Prince production of Gounod's ''Faust'' at the Metropolitan Opera. One audience member got into the mood by lacquering her hair into a devil's horn. Up in the boxes, an enormous ru...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Mephistopheles cavorted on stage Thursday night in a new Hal Prince production of Gounod's ''Faust'' at the Metropolitan Opera. One audience member got into the mood by lacquering her hair into a devil's horn. Up in the boxes, an enormous ruby-and-diamond butterfly that could have flown out of Marguerite's garden was perched on Judy Taubman's shoulder.

headline.main: Evening Hours;   'Faust' Brings Out A Devilish Group
